meanings.definition: Existing or occurring below the surface of the earth.
meanings.sent1: The miners discovered a valuable subsurface deposit.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologists found ancient artifacts in the subsurface layers.
meanings.sent3: The subsurface water made the soil muddy and difficult to walk on.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts ran deep, like a subsurface river flowing silently.
meanings.sent5: The subsurface world beneath our feet holds many secrets.

meanings.definition: Located or found beneath the surface of something.
meanings.sent1: The subsurface tunnel provided a hidden passage for the spies.
meanings.sent2: The subsurface roots of the tree spread far and wide.
meanings.sent3: The subsurface parking garage was a clever solution to limited space.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were like subsurface currents, unseen but powerful.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the subsurface layers of the ocean reveals a whole new world.
